text:
Every industry creates and stores massive 
amounts of archival data.

And each organization has unique needs
 when it comes to accessing it.

Some data may be stored & go untouched
for months or even years at a time.

Some might be needed instantly — even 
if it hasn’t been accessed in a long time.
Amazon S3 Glacier storage classes are ideal for archiving
rarely-accessed data—no matter how quickly you need it.

These storage classes are cost-effective, highly 
durable, and secure for long-lived archive data.

For data you might need urgently, such as news 
media archives, or user generated content,
S3 Glacier Instant Retrieval delivers your data in milliseconds.

You can reduce storage costs further by
using S3 Glacier Flexible Retrieval,
with data retrieval options ranging from minutes to hours
for use cases such as backups or disaster recovery.

And to save even more, S3 Glacier Deep Archive 
is the lowest cost storage in the cloud,

with data retrieval within hours for compliance
archives, or digital preservation.
All three S3 Glacier storage classes provide unlimited scale,
the highest security standards,
and data durability of 11 9’s.

With AWS, increase the value of your 
digital assets, unlock agility, and save money...
...without creating complex on-premises archives and management headaches for your team.
There’s no better place to archive your data than in Amazon S3.
